predicate.note: Frames file for 'listen' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries 30.3 35.5, no other framed members. (?) Comparison to 'hear'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: ``We watch the same indicators and listen to the same prognosticators.''

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Willliam Greaney said that the influence of the appeals court in New York ``will make insurers sit up and listen.''
